name: Middle School Mayhem
description:
Known issues:

  • Sometimes teachers might not see that there's a student in the area.
  • Sometimes teachers might attack students after they leave the classroom.
  • All doors are unlocked by default. Instead, they should unlock as classroom exploration progresses.
  • Students may cry uncontrollably after they leave the group.
  • Students may go behind the walls and making them unable to go back to their group.

Remember that having a lot of bugs is also a design aspect of Chaos!

All of the bugs listed will be fixed in repository in the coming days and an update will be pushed after the jam is over!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

The game features support for controllers. The controls listed below are for the Xbox Controller:

Move: WASD | Controller: Left Joystick

Sprint: Left Shift | Controller: LB or RB

Perform action/interact: Space | Controller: A

Place Explosive: J | Controller: X

Place Itching Bomb: K | Controller: Y

Place Sting Bomb: L | Controller: B

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Middle School Mayhem is an action game about a student who plans to free all the students from their boring and oppressive school. The student group gets bigger and powerful as more students join in. The ultimate goal is to storm into the principal’s office and cause chaos in the school.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Under the hood:

The game is built with Unity 2021.1 using Cinemachine and some 2D packages (2D IK, Animation, Sprite, Sprite Shape and others).

The game also features a custom Level Streaming system for faster scene loading and better overall performance.

Middle School Mayhem is open-source at https://github.com/konstantin890/middle-school-mayhem under the GNU GPL v3 License. (Will be made open-source when the jam voting period is over!)
